jim package¶

Пакет, включающий в себя набор модулей, позволяющих отрисовывать и обрабатывать сообщения на клиентской стороне.

classes.py¶

class jim.classes.ServerThread(logger)¶

Running server object as a thread.

alive()¶

Return thread alive status, boolean.

start()¶

Read server settings and run Server object in a thread and store output in self variable.

stop()¶

Calls stop for early running thread and join it.

class jim.classes.UsersExtension¶

Class abstraction above user model in SQLAlchemy.

property active_users¶

Return dict with active users like a

{ «username»: <value>, «address»: <value>, «port»: <value>, «atime»: <value> }

property all_sockets¶

Return sockets dict with users connections.

authenticate(username, password)¶

Validate user password and create user if doesn’t exist. Function calculate hash from string user + passwd + salt.

contact_operation(action, user, input_contact)¶

Function add or del link between users in contacts if users exist. Operation depends on action «add_contact» or «del_contact».

disconnect(address, port)¶

Try to make disconnected user is inactive. Found in history database last session with current address and port, set this user flag is_active to False.

get_chat(recipient, sender=None)¶

Return chat dialog between users or group. Messages limit in request = 50. Answer is a dict

{ «from»: sender, «to»: recipient, «text»: text, «ctime»: ctime.isoformat(), }

get_contacts(user)¶

Get contact usernames by username-owner. Background it called SQL query like a:

SELECT u2.username FROM contacts JOIN users ON users.id = contacts.owner JOIN users AS u2 ON u2.id = contacts.contact WHERE users.username = user;

get_socket(client)¶

Return socket data from internal dict «sockets». Record in this «sockets» will be added when user will be connected to server.

is_active(client)¶

Return boolean value and check that user exists and active (is_active firld is True)

join(client, chat)¶

Group logic, don’t used yet.

leave(client, chat)¶

Group logic, don’t used yet.

presence(client, socket)¶

Create and save user history when received presence message type.

put_message(sender, recipient, encoding, message)¶

Offline message logic.

quit(client)¶

Currently not used.

update_atime(client)¶

Function call update with empty object, it causes update atime field in database.

property users_history¶

Return users login history, presented as a dict:

{ «username»: <value>, «address»: <value>, «port»: <value>, «ctime»: <value> }

config.py¶

Module describes server configuration.

Recommends for changing only:

  • SERVER_ADDRESS, IPaddress, where server will be listened

  • SERVER_PORT, like a server address, but a port

  • SERVER_LOGFILE, define path to client logs

  • LOGLEVEL, default level is debug

  • SALT, it’s secure value, YOU MUST CHANGED IT IN PRODUCTION

decorators.py¶

Module describes decorators.

jim.decorators.log(func)¶

Function-decorator creates record about called function.

descriptors.py¶

class jim.descriptors.Port¶

Descriptor check port range, that must be in 1024-65535 range.

messages.py¶

jim.messages.get_contacts(account_name=None)¶

Return dict, that contains request «get_contacts». Used for load user list.

jim.messages.get_recipient(message)¶

Function try to read recipient from data or return None.

jim.messages.is_authenticate(message=None)¶

Checks that message has authenticate data. Return (username, password) or None.

jim.messages.is_chat(message)¶

Checks that message has chat message. Return (from, to) or None.

jim.messages.is_contact_operation(message)¶

Checks that message has operation with contacts (add/del). Return (action, user, contact) or None.

jim.messages.is_key_exchange(message)¶

Checks that message has key_exchange data. Return key or None.

jim.messages.is_message(message)¶

Checks that message has msg data. Return (from, to, encoding, message) or None.

jim.messages.is_presence_message(message)¶

Checks that message has presence data. Return username or None.

metaclasses.py¶

class jim.metaclasses.ServerVerifier(name, bases, attrs)¶

Metaclass verify:

  • class doesn’t contain connect call in methods

  • class contains «SOCK_STREAM» and «AF_INET» in global import, but doesn’t validate, that these constans will be used

models.py¶

Models contains user presentation in database.

class jim.models.Contacts(**kwargs)¶
class jim.models.GroupMembers(**kwargs)¶
class jim.models.Groups(**kwargs)¶
class jim.models.Messages(**kwargs)¶
class jim.models.Users(**kwargs)¶
class jim.models.UsersHistory(**kwargs)¶

security.py¶

class jim.security.AsymmetricCipher(public_key=None)¶

Class used for trasnport session key: session key = get_random_bytes(32)

decrypt(binary_message)¶

Decrypt binary data with public key.

encrypt(binary_message)¶

Crypt binary data with public key.

class jim.security.SymmetricCipher(key)¶

Class creates logic, that let use symmetric ciphers, based on AES.

decrypt(binary_message)¶

Return your cripted message as a decrypted binary data.

encrypt(binary_message)¶

Crypt your binary message.

jim.security.get_text_digest(text, salt='')¶

Return text digest combined with salt value. Uses SHA-256 algorithm.

utils.py¶

jim.utils.is_valid_message(msg)¶

Function check that received message is correct.

jim.utils.load_server_settings()¶

Func returns serer settins from settings.ini presented as a dict:

{ «address»: <value>, «port»: <value>, «storage»: <value>, }

jim.utils.make_raw_json(python_object)¶

Принимает объект python и делает из него JSON преставление в бинрном виде (с помощью encode).

jim.utils.parse_raw_json(binary_json)¶

Принимает на вход бинарный объект и конвертирует его в python представление, или возвращает пустой словарь.

jim.utils.recv_data(sock, cipher_object=None)¶

Финкция сначала читает 4 байта из сокета — длина сообщения, а затем само сообщение, декодируем и возвращает разобранный json в виде структуры данных python.

jim.utils.save_server_settings(address, port, storage)¶

Func stores server settings (address, port, storage) into sessings.ini.

jim.utils.send_data(sock, data, cipher_object=None)¶

Функция отправляет сообщение в сокет добавляя в начало сообщения его длину, это позволяет вычитывать из сокета в recv_data сначала 4 байта — длина сообщения, а потом само сообщение по длине.

JSON instant messenger server
